_header: Booth beware bishop though thou be
Subjects: Booth, William, bishop of Coventry and Lichfield, 1447-52, tr. York 1452-64.
_description: On Bishop Booth — 119 lines in rhyme royal stanzas

BLCottRollsII23.First Lines:
Booth be ware bisshoppe though þu beSith that Symon hym selff
                    set þe in thy sete…
BLCottRollsII23.Last Lines:
…Youre labour for lucere is playnly aspiedGod for his mercy
                    all this reume gyde
